  • client.filters.financing

client.filters.financing 源代码

from django_filters import rest_framework as filters

from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate, FinanceProject



[文档]class FinancesFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    融资审批列表页过滤器
    """
    number = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="icontains", field_name="number")
    capital_company_name = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="contains", field_name="credit__capital_company__name")
    finance_number = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="icontains", field_name="financeproject__finance_number")
    finance_company = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="contains", field_name="from_company__name")
    start_date = filters.CharFilter(field_name="number", lookup_expr="gte")
    end_date = filters.CharFilter(field_name="number", lookup_expr="lte")


[文档]    class Meta:
        model = CreditCertificate
        fields = [
            "number", "capital_company_name", "finance_number",
            "end_date", "start_date", "finance_company"
        ]




[文档]class FinanceProjectFilter(filters.FilterSet):
    """
    融资项目列表页过滤器
    """
    finance_number = filters.CharFilter(lookup_expr="icontains", field_name="finance_number")  # 融资项目编号
    finance_company = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_finance_company")  # 融资企业
    cc_number = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_cc_number")  # 智信编号
    status = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_status")  # 过滤状态
    finance_sign_start = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_finance_sign_start")  # 融资申请开始时间
    finance_sign_end = filters.CharFilter(method="filter_finance_sign_end")  # 融资申请结束时间


[文档]    def filter_finance_company(self, querset, name, value):
        """
        过滤融资企业
        :param querset:
        :param name:
        :param value:
        :return:
        """
        return querset.filter(credit_certificate__company__name__icontains=value)



[文档]    def filter_cc_number(self, querset, name, value):
        """
        过滤智信编号
        :param querset:
        :param name:
        :param value:
        :return:
        """
        return querset.filter(credit_certificate__number__contains=value)



[文档]    def filter_status(self, querset, name, value):
        """
        根据状态过滤
        :param querset:
        :param name:
        :param value:
        :return:
        """
        if not value:
            return querset
        else:
            return querset.filter(status=value)



[文档]    def filter_finance_sign_start(self, querset, name, value):
        """
        过滤融资申请开始时间
        :param querset:
        :param name:
        :param value:
        :return:
        """
        return querset.filter(sign_contract_at__gt=value)



[文档]    def filter_finance_sign_end(self, querset, name, value):
        """
        融资申请开始时间
        :param querset:
        :param name:
        :param value:
        :return:
        """
        return querset.filter(sign_contract_at__lt=value)



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = FinanceProject
        fields = [
            "finance_number",
            "finance_company",
            "cc_number",
            "finance_sign_start",
            "finance_sign_end"
        ]
